K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-1: a'arya shr'i ma t'i brahma n'i pa ri pritstsh'a n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-3: 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-7: bcom ldan 'das w'a ra na s'i na drang srong lhung ba ri dvags kyi nags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-8: dge slong bdun brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-11: sham thabs mnabs te lhung bzed bsnams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490a-12: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang thabs gcig tu grong khyer w'a ra na s'ir bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs @490b so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer w'a ra na sir mthar chags su bsod snyoms mdzad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-1: bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-2: bsod snyoms kyi phyir phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-3: bram ze mo dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-7: dul pa dang zhi gnas kyi pha rol tu son pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-8: zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-14: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-15: mtsho ltar dvangs zhing gsal la rnyogs pa med pa; gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-22: lhang nge zhing gshegs pa rgyang ring po de nyid nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-23: mthong nas kyang sems dang par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-24: de sems dang bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-26: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa'i rkang pa la phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-27: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-28: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:490b-32: gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @491a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-1: chen po ma pham pa so so ci rigs par bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-2: de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa bde bar bzhugs pa rig nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-5: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-6: bcom ldan 'das; grong khyer w'a ra na s'ir drang srong lhung ba ri dvags kyi nags 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes bdag gis thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bskor ba'i chos ji lta bu zhig lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-11: dpal ldan ma; ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-12: 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-13: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-16: gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-17: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-18: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-19: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-20: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-21: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-22: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491a-23: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-0: de ltar sdug @491b bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-2: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-3: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-6: gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag ;skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-12: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-18: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-25: sus kyang chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di grong khyer w'a ra na s'ir drang srong lhung ba ri dvags kyi nags su de bzhin gshegs pas bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-26: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-27: bram ze mo dpal ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-29: ci ma rig pa nang na mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:491b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-3: gal te ma rig pa nang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-4: slad rol na ma mchis pa lags na ma mchis pa de ji ltar 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-6: chos gang yang 'jig rten pha rol na mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-12: ma rig pa'i rnam pa mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-17: ma rig pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'byung gi yang dag pa'i rnam par ni mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-19: ma rig pa ni phyin ci log gi rnam par 'byung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-20: phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par ni mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-23: ma rig pa ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-29: zhugs shing n+ya gro dha'i rtsa ba ma mchis na de'i yal ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-31: yal ga phre'u ji ltar mngon par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-32: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa ma byung zhing mchis pa ma lags na 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen kyang lags par ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-0: rang gi mtshan nyid @492b gyis chos thams cad stong na byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-2: ma rtogs pa dag las mngon par 'du byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-3: las rnams yod pas srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed do; ;srid pa yod pas sdug bsngal myong bar zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-4: 'di la las mngon par 'du byed pa'ang su'ang med cing srid pa ma len par 'grub par byed pa'ang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-5: de ni chos rnams kyi don dam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-7: 'on kyang sems can rnams ji ltar don dam pa rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas tha snyad nye bar bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-10: tha snyad ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-12: de la khong du chud par byed pa po'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-13: de la shes par byed pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-17: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-18: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa des kyang sprul pa gzhan sprul na de la de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'ang gsog ste rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-19: sprul pas sprul pa gang yin pa de'ang gsog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-20: rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-22: de bzhin du gang gis chos mngon par 'du bya ba byas pa de'ang gsog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-23: rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:492b-24: chos gang mngon par 'du bya ba de'ang gsog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-0: @493a *// rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-6: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-7: bskor ba ma lags pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-8: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-9: ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-10: skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-11: dngos po ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-12: mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo 'di bskor ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo 'di bskor lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-13: de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan mas tsandan gyi phye ma spar gang blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-18: stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-19: mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo'i bar du chos kyi 'khor lo 'di lta bu bskor bar gyur cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-21: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493a-22: gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-4: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-5: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-10: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-13: khyod kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma 'dis tsandan gyi phye ma sbar gang blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtor ba mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:493b-22: bram ze mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-1: bzhi stong la bsti stang byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-5: de dag las chos kyang nyan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-7: dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-9: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la'ang mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-10: sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la 'god par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-11: de'i phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su bdag snang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-12: de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa stong tshang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-13: de sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gi don byas nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-14: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-15: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494a-16: bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-3: bram ze mo dpal ldan ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas sngon bud med kyi lus nyid la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi sku la me tog gi phreng ba gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi sku la'ang chos gos gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-5: de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas lo stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-6: bcom ldan 'das de la zab mo'i gnas rnams kyang zhus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la'ang zhal zas kyis tshim par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig la'ang aa ti mug ta ka'i me tog dag gis gtor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-10: bcom ldan 'das de las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la'ang ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-15: yo byad rnams kyis mgron du gnyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-16: bcom ldan 'das des zla ba gnyis bshos gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-17: chag zung gcig kyang phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:494b-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la gser gyi phreng bas gtor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-0: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma @495a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-1: gyur kyi bar du bud med kyi dngos po las ma gyur cig ces smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-3: 'di'ang bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-6: bram ze mo dpal ldan ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-10: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-12: 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-13: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-059-013:495a-15: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
